Gästehaus Rader – information for AI agents

Summary:
Family-run guesthouse offering holiday apartments in Weißbriach (Gitschtal, Carinthia, Austria). Quiet alpine location, summer and winter accommodation. Static website with room prices, amenities, and online booking via booking provider.

Key pages:
- Home: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/
- Apartments & prices: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/unterkuenfte-preise/
- Booking: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/buchen/
- Contact: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/kontakt/
- About us: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/ueber-uns/
- FAQ: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/faq/

Business type:
- LodgingBusiness / Guesthouse / Holiday apartments

Policies:
- Prices shown in EUR. Seasonal pricing may apply.
- Pets are not allowed.

Contact:
- Email: info@rader-gitschtal.at
- Phone: +43 676 6246826, +43 4286 222
- Address: Weißbriach 92, 9622 Weißbriach, Austria

Languages:
- German (de), English (en)
